content.description: Blackerby ridge ice climbs are popular due to the short approaches, minimal avalanche exposure, and (sometimes) high quality ice. You can generally see if the climbs are in by looking up from the road. The ice is generally slower to form than Mount Juneau or little Nugget and climbs are often wet even after long cold spells.The Alaska Ice Climbing website describes most of the climbs: alaskaiceclimbing.com/blackâ€¦
